batchchecklayeravailability.name: BatchCheckLayerAvailability
batchchecklayeravailability.description: Grants permission to check the availability of multiple image layers in a specified registry and repository

batchdeleteimage.name: BatchDeleteImage
batchdeleteimage.description: Grants permission to delete a list of specified images within a specified repository

batchgetimage.name: BatchGetImage
batchgetimage.description: Grants permission to get detailed information for specified images within a specified repository

batchgetrepositoryscanningconfiguration.name: BatchGetRepositoryScanningConfiguration
batchgetrepositoryscanningconfiguration.description: Grants permission to retrieve repository scanning configuration for a list of repositories

batchimportupstreamimage.name: BatchImportUpstreamImage
batchimportupstreamimage.description: Grants permission to retrieve the image from the upstream registry and import it to your private registry

completelayerupload.name: CompleteLayerUpload
completelayerupload.description: Grants permission to inform Amazon ECR that the image layer upload for a specified registry, repository name, and upload ID, has completed

createpullthroughcacherule.name: CreatePullThroughCacheRule
createpullthroughcacherule.description: Grants permission to create new pull-through cache rule

createrepository.name: CreateRepository
createrepository.description: Grants permission to create an image repository

createrepositorycreationtemplate.name: CreateRepositoryCreationTemplate
createrepositorycreationtemplate.description: Grants permission to create the repository creation template

deletelifecyclepolicy.name: DeleteLifecyclePolicy
deletelifecyclepolicy.description: Grants permission to delete the specified lifecycle policy

deletepullthroughcacherule.name: DeletePullThroughCacheRule
deletepullthroughcacherule.description: Grants permission to delete the pull-through cache rule

deleteregistrypolicy.name: DeleteRegistryPolicy
deleteregistrypolicy.description: Grants permission to delete the registry policy

deleterepository.name: DeleteRepository
deleterepository.description: Grants permission to delete an existing image repository

deleterepositorycreationtemplate.name: DeleteRepositoryCreationTemplate
deleterepositorycreationtemplate.description: Grants permission to delete the repository creation template

deleterepositorypolicy.name: DeleteRepositoryPolicy
deleterepositorypolicy.description: Grants permission to delete the repository policy from a specified repository

describeimagereplicationstatus.name: DescribeImageReplicationStatus
describeimagereplicationstatus.description: Grants permission to retrieve replication status about an image in a registry, including failure reason if replication fails

describeimagescanfindings.name: DescribeImageScanFindings
describeimagescanfindings.description: Grants permission to describe the image scan findings for the specified image

describeimages.name: DescribeImages
describeimages.description: Grants permission to get metadata about the images in a repository, including image size, image tags, and creation date

describepullthroughcacherules.name: DescribePullThroughCacheRules
describepullthroughcacherules.description: Grants permission to describe the pull-through cache rules

describeregistry.name: DescribeRegistry
describeregistry.description: Grants permission to describe the registry settings

describerepositories.name: DescribeRepositories
describerepositories.description: Grants permission to describe image repositories in a registry

describerepositorycreationtemplates.name: DescribeRepositoryCreationTemplates
describerepositorycreationtemplates.description: Grants permission to describe the repository creation template

getaccountsetting.name: GetAccountSetting
getaccountsetting.description: Grants permission to retrieve account settings

getauthorizationtoken.name: GetAuthorizationToken
getauthorizationtoken.description: Grants permission to retrieve a token that is valid for a specified registry for 12 hours

getdownloadurlforlayer.name: GetDownloadUrlForLayer
getdownloadurlforlayer.description: Grants permission to retrieve the download URL corresponding to an image layer

getlifecyclepolicy.name: GetLifecyclePolicy
getlifecyclepolicy.description: Grants permission to retrieve the specified lifecycle policy

getlifecyclepolicypreview.name: GetLifecyclePolicyPreview
getlifecyclepolicypreview.description: Grants permission to retrieve the results of the specified lifecycle policy preview request

getregistrypolicy.name: GetRegistryPolicy
getregistrypolicy.description: Grants permission to retrieve the registry policy

getregistryscanningconfiguration.name: GetRegistryScanningConfiguration
getregistryscanningconfiguration.description: Grants permission to retrieve registry scanning configuration

getrepositorypolicy.name: GetRepositoryPolicy
getrepositorypolicy.description: Grants permission to retrieve the repository policy for a specified repository

initiatelayerupload.name: InitiateLayerUpload
initiatelayerupload.description: Grants permission to notify Amazon ECR that you intend to upload an image layer

listimages.name: ListImages
listimages.description: Grants permission to list all the image IDs for a given repository

listtagsforresource.name: ListTagsForResource
listtagsforresource.description: Grants permission to list the tags for an Amazon ECR resource

putaccountsetting.name: PutAccountSetting
putaccountsetting.description: Grants permission to update account settings

putimage.name: PutImage
putimage.description: Grants permission to create or update the image manifest associated with an image

putimagescanningconfiguration.name: PutImageScanningConfiguration
putimagescanningconfiguration.description: Grants permission to update the image scanning configuration for a repository

putimagetagmutability.name: PutImageTagMutability
putimagetagmutability.description: Grants permission to update the image tag mutability settings for a repository

putlifecyclepolicy.name: PutLifecyclePolicy
putlifecyclepolicy.description: Grants permission to create or update a lifecycle policy

putregistrypolicy.name: PutRegistryPolicy
putregistrypolicy.description: Grants permission to update the registry policy

putregistryscanningconfiguration.name: PutRegistryScanningConfiguration
putregistryscanningconfiguration.description: Grants permission to update registry scanning configuration

putreplicationconfiguration.name: PutReplicationConfiguration
putreplicationconfiguration.description: Grants permission to update the replication configuration for the registry

replicateimage.name: ReplicateImage
replicateimage.description: Grants permission to replicate images to the destination registry

setrepositorypolicy.name: SetRepositoryPolicy
setrepositorypolicy.description: Grants permission to apply a repository policy on a specified repository to control access permissions

startimagescan.name: StartImageScan
startimagescan.description: Grants permission to start an image scan

startlifecyclepolicypreview.name: StartLifecyclePolicyPreview
startlifecyclepolicypreview.description: Grants permission to start a preview of the specified lifecycle policy

tagresource.name: TagResource
tagresource.description: Grants permission to tag an Amazon ECR resource

untagresource.name: UntagResource
untagresource.description: Grants permission to untag an Amazon ECR resource

updatepullthroughcacherule.name: UpdatePullThroughCacheRule
updatepullthroughcacherule.description: Grants permission to update the pull-through cache rule

updaterepositorycreationtemplate.name: UpdateRepositoryCreationTemplate
updaterepositorycreationtemplate.description: Grants permission to update the repository creation template

uploadlayerpart.name: UploadLayerPart
uploadlayerpart.description: Grants permission to upload an image layer part to Amazon ECR

validatepullthroughcacherule.name: ValidatePullThroughCacheRule
validatepullthroughcacherule.description: Grants permission to validate the pull-through cache rule
